question_id: Tampilkan nama depan, nama belakang, dan kota tempat tinggal semua pelanggan yang pernah menyewa film dengan kategori animasi pada tahun 2006.
sql_query:
SELECT
    a.first_name,
    a.last_name,
    c.city
FROM
    customer c
JOIN
    rental r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id
JOIN
    film f ON r.rental_id = f.film_id
JOIN
    film_category fc ON f.film_id = fc.film_id
JOIN
    category cat ON fc.category_id = cat.category_id
WHERE
    cat.name = 'Animasi'
    AND STRFTIME('%Y', f.release_year) = '2006'
    AND c.active = '1'
GROUP BY
    a.first_name,
    a.last_name,
    c.city
raw_response:
```sql
SELECT
    a.first_name,
    a.last_name,
    c.city
FROM
    customer c
JOIN
    rental r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id
JOIN
    film f ON r.rental_id = f.film_id
JOIN
    film_category fc ON f.film_id = fc.film_id
JOIN
    category cat ON fc.category_id = cat.category_id
WHERE
    cat.name = 'Animasi'
    AND STRFTIME('%Y', f.release_year) = '2006'
    AND c.active = '1'
GROUP BY
    a.first_name,
    a.last_name,
    c.city;
```
